A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Dissapointed. The movie didn't match the bsic Star Wars lore. This movie made me question if I should see the next one. 

Luke Skywalker's character is deplorable. 

Holdo is on a power trip and creates a situation that gets more Rebel Alliance members killed.

Rose creates more suffering in the universe. Released animals will be captured the next day\, also the animal Keepers will be punished/tortured.
Roses selfishness stops Fin from sabotaging the battering ram\, and consequencely her actions allow more Rebel deaths.
Plot holes and Lore holes.

Master code breaker completely useless\, because Finn and Rose thought a nobody would be better. 

By destroying the casino they lost all chances of having the services of the master codebreaker ( which was sympathetic to the cause of the rebellion )

No Character advancement of Leia (and you can't take that back RIP) 

Rose falls in love within 17hrs of meeting Finn\, endangers Finn's life for a kiss\,  while advanced ATK "Walkers" sit and watch (did nothing).

Major Darkforce on Island turns out to be useless mirror.
Jedi training lessons - Lukes Character goes against Yoda's teachings "pass on what you know". Luke's training was intensive- Rae's training is Word Games and "secrete knowledge "
